mapper.update: update DIARY set DIARY_TITLE = #{diaryTitle}, DIARY_CONTENT = #{diaryContent}, DIARY_OPEN = #{diaryOpen}, DIARY_IMG = #{diaryImg} where DIARY_SEQ = #{diarySeq}
mapper.delete: delete from DIARY where DIARY_SEQ = #{diarySeq} and MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}
mapper.update: update DIARY set DIARY_IMG = NULL where DIARY_SEQ = #{diarySeq}
update DIARY set DIARY_COUNT = DIARY_COUNT+1 where DIARY_SEQ = #{diarySeq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from DIARY where MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}
select MEMBER_NICKNAME from MEMBER where MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into HEART (HEART_SEQ, DIARY_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ) values (H_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{diarySeq}, #{memberSeq})
mapper.delete: delete from HEART where DIARY_SEQ = #{diarySeq} and MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}
